title: Independent MPs seek China’s support
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A meeting between a group of independent Parliamentarians and the Chinese Ambassador to Sri Lanka, Qi Zhenhong was held at the Parliament recently.
They exchanged views on the current situation in Sri Lanka, China’s support extended to Sri Lanka and topics of mutual interest.
Independent Parliamentarians have called on the ambassador to extend China’s continued support to Sri Lanka in the future as well.
